import React from 'react' import Slider from "react-slick"; import './index.css' function ConsultationCarousel({ data }) { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1 }; console.log(data); return (
{ data && data.length > 0 && data.map((element, key) => { return (
{element.doctorName} Appointment Time : {element.appointmentTimes} Appointment Reason : {element.reasonForVisit}
 
Reports :
{/*
{ reports.length > 0 ? reports.map((each_report, key) => { return (
{ downloadFile(reports[key].filecontent) }} className="report-name">{each_report.filename}
) }) :
( No reports uploaded. Click the + button to add report )
}
*/}
) }) }
) } export default ConsultationCarousel
